data.title: ViaTech Publishing Solutions
data.meta_description: For more than twenty years, ViaTech has been the leading automator and distributor of learning, compliance and one-to-one marketing communications. We concentrate on business process optimization, allowing our customers to focus entirely on their core competencies.
data.text:
By integrating our proprietary workflow software into your existing processes, your business gets an instant upgrade with an inventory management system, customized eCommerce site, and a fulfillment house. Better yet you have an entire account team managing the logistics side of your business, and analytics to understand your orders and track them in real time.

ViaTech’s Content Management Solution can help you distribute all of your enterprise content across multiple locations or franchises - - all from a single branded platform. Whether it's materials for a training course, branded items that promote your business or marketing kits with resources from multiple vendors, ViaTech’s Centralized Content Management Solution can make managing your enterprise content simple.

We work with you to handle the logistics, ordering and vendor management, freeing you to focus on other aspects of your business. Once a product is ordered, our state-of-the-art distribution system will make sure it gets where it’s going on time with real-time tracking that shows you where it is from warehouse to delivery. To help ensure the process runs smoothly, you will have an experienced Account Manager assisting with your order every step of the way.

Whether it’s compliance documentation, member communications, or marketing information, ViaTech can help streamline your content creation and distribution workflows. Mandated communications, such as the Summary of Benefits, Annual Notice of Changes and Explanation of Benefits present the added challenges of adhering to a prescribed format and delivery deadlines. By integrating our proprietary workflow software into your existing processes, your content, plan and member information are consolidated into a HIPAA-compliant environment.

By integrating our proprietary workflow software into your existing processes, your business gets an instant upgrade with an inventory management system, customized eCommerce site, and a fulfillment house. Better yet you have an entire account team managing the logistics side of your business, and analytics to understand your orders and track them in real time.

ViaTech’s Content Management Solution can help you distribute all of your enterprise content across multiple locations or franchises - - all from a single branded platform. Whether it's materials for a training course, branded items that promote your business or marketing kits with resources from multiple vendors, ViaTech’s Centralized Content Management Solution can make managing your enterprise content simple.
